page.title: 06NORTH WARNBOROUGH. THE M3
page.content: At the round-about by the M3 Junction, the A287,the A30 and the A32 roads meet. The M3 Junction is very busy with cars,vans, heavy lorries and motor- bikes each day. The new Farnham by-pass helps to keep the traffic flowing smoothly and quickly. Near the M3 Junction there is a large Motor-way Maintenance Depot containing many vehicles to keep the Motor-way serviceable during the winter months. The primary land cover is deciduous woodland, consisting of Oak, Hazel, Beech and Horse-chestnut trees. Nearby is a private plantation of Conifers. The secondary land cover surrounding the M3 Junction is farm-land,with wheat crops and a few fields for rough grazing. A private estate of sixteen houses has recently been completed at Bartley Heath, nearby. The Bartley Heath Pottery produces hand-made goods
